description:
Mega Glo Lip & Cheek Color - Coral Dream: The Ultimate Dual-Purpose Makeup Essential

Experience the vibrant allure of Coral Dream, a stunning multi-use makeup product that brings effortless beauty to your daily routine. This versatile lip and cheek tint delivers a radiant coral flush that complements all skin tones while providing long-lasting color that transitions seamlessly from day to night. âœ¨

Product Information

Brand Wet n Wild
Product Type Cream Blush & Lip Tint
Size 9g / 0.32oz
Finish Dewy, Natural Glow
Formulation Cream-to-powder

Color Profile

Base Tone Warm Coral
Undertone Peachy-Pink
Finish Luminous Sheen

Key Features of Mega Glo Lip & Cheek Color

  • ðŸŒ¸ Dual-purpose formula for lips and cheeks reduces makeup bag clutter
  • ðŸ’« Buildable color intensity from subtle flush to vibrant pop
  • ðŸŒ¿ Infused with nourishing ingredients including vitamin E and murumuru butter
  • ðŸ’Ž Blendable cream-to-powder formula for seamless application
  • âœ¨ Long-wearing color that lasts up to 8 hours
  • ðŸ”¥ Lightweight, non-greasy texture that feels comfortable all day

The Coral Dream shade is a universally flattering warm coral with subtle golden shimmer that instantly brightens the complexion. This bestselling makeup essential creates a natural-looking flush that mimics the radiance of sun-kissed skin.

About Wet n Wild

Founded in 1979, Wet n Wild has revolutionized the beauty industry by offering high-quality, cruelty-free cosmetics at affordable prices. The brand is committed to creating innovative vegan-friendly products that perform exceptionally well while remaining accessible to all beauty enthusiasts. The Mega Glo collection represents their dedication to creating multi-functional products that deliver professional results.

How to Apply Your Coral Dream Lip & Cheek Color

For cheeks: Use fingertips or a makeup brush to tap a small amount onto the apples of your cheeks, blending upward toward your temples for a natural flush.

For lips: Apply directly from the pan using your fingertip or a lip brush, building intensity as desired. Can be worn alone for a stained effect or topped with clear gloss for added dimension.

Frequently Asked Question

Q: Will Coral Dream work on all skin tones?
A: Yes! The Mega Glo Lip & Cheek Color in Coral Dream has been specially formulated to complement all skin tones. On fair skin, it creates a vibrant pop of color; on medium skin, it offers a natural flush; and on deeper skin tones, it provides a subtle luminous glow. The buildable formula allows you to customize the intensity for your perfect look.

##
short_description:
Discover Mega Glo Lip & Cheek Color in Coral Dream, a versatile cream-to-powder formula that delivers radiant, buildable color for both lips and cheeks. Infused with nourishing ingredients, this multi-tasking beauty essential creates a natural, sun-kissed glow that lasts all day.
